title: Critical TypeScript Fixes - Core Type Exports & Critical Errors
description: Fix critical type export issues that block other TypeScript compilation. Addresses TS4023 errors for unexported types and TS2454/TS2538 variable issues.

tasks.description: Export CompiledExpression, CompileFunction, and StringOptions interfaces in Node.ts - Add 'export' keyword to interface CompiledExpression, type CompileFunction, and interface StringOptions at lines 10-22
Fix variable assignment issues in OperatorNode.ts - Initialize 'result' variable with default value at lines 256-264 to resolve 'used before assigned' errors
Fix index type issues in OperatorNode.ts - Add null checks before using 'op' as index at lines 115, 205, 215 where 'Type null cannot be used as index type'
Fix private property issues in ImmutableDenseMatrix.ts - Convert 'private _max' and 'private _min' at line 73 to ES private fields using # syntax or make public with underscore convention
Fix private property issues in MatrixIndex.ts - Convert private '_dimensions', '_isScalar', '_sourceSize' at line 50 to ES private fields or public with underscore convention

acceptanceCriteria: npm run compile:ts shows reduced error count
